item.description: Operating Systems | Fall 2023 # Description # Linux Kernel Theory and Practice, important Operating System Responsibilities (Virtual addressing, Scheduling, etc)
Fastly Internship | Summer 2023 # Overview # At Fastly, I optimized and helped redesign a recently ported Rust program, essential to the functionality of Fastly’s CDN.
